item.title: python学习
item.description: 目录操作 os.getcwd(): 获取当前所在目录 os.chdir(dir): 改变工作目录为“dir”

item.title: 使用R下载SRA数据
item.description: library(SRAdb) setwd("/home/wqh/sra_download/SRR6660814") sra_dbname <- "../SRAmetadb.sqlite" sra_con <- dbConnect(dbDriver("SQLite"), sra_dbname) # For Failed to open TCP Connection # iptables -I INPUT -p tcp --dport 33001 -j ACCEPT # iptables -I OUTPUT -p tcp --dport 33001 -j ACCEPT ## Download sra files from NCBI SRA using ftp protocol: getSRAfile( c("SRR6660815"), sra_con, fileType='fastq') ## Download fastq files from EBI ftp siteusing fasp protocol: ascpCMD <- '/home/wqh/.aspera/connect/bin/ascp -QT -l 300m -P 33001 -i /home/wqh/.aspera/connect/etc/asperaweb_id_dsa.openssh'

item.title: R网页爬虫

item.title: R中文件读写函数
item.description: 示例数据1 (50 MB) require(data.table) # Demo speed-up n = 1e6 DT = data.table( a=sample(1:1000,n,replace=TRUE), b=sample(1:1000,n,replace=TRUE), c=rnorm(n), d=sample(c("foo","bar","baz","qux","quux"),n,replace=TRUE), e=rnorm(n), f=sample(1:1000,n,replace=TRUE) ) DT[2,b:=NA_integer_] DT[4,c:=NA_real_] DT[3,d:=NA_character_] DT[5,d:=""] DT[2,e:=+Inf] DT[3,e:=-Inf] system.time(write.table(DT,"test.csv",sep=",",row.names=FALSE,quote=FALSE)) cat("File size (MB):", round(file.info("test.csv")$size/1024^2),"\n") # 50 MB (1e6 rows x 6 columns) 使用read.csv读入 # 第一次读入 system.time(DF1 <- read.csv("test.csv",stringsAsFactors=FALSE)) # 5.8 sec (first time in

item.title: 自动化交易基础--知识点扫盲
item.description: 配套代码 净值曲线 是交易账户的价值随时间变化的曲线，它刻画了现金加上投资组合的价值总和随时间的变化。若账户的投资金额不变，我们希望它呈直线上升

item.title: GenomicRanges
item.description: 基因组集合操作union,intersect,setdiff 1. union取两个基因组区域的并集 x <- GRanges("chr1", IRanges(c(2, 9) , c(7, 19)), strand=c("+", "-")) y <- GRanges("chr1", IRanges(5, 10), strand="-") union(x, y) union(x, y, ignore.strand=TRUE) 2. i

item.title: Quantification(transcript-level)--Salmon
item.description: Salmon是快速RNA-seq转录组定量工具。它需要提供一组目标转录本（参考转录本或者从头组装的转录本）进行定量。 两种模式： - quasi-mapping-based: 参考转录本

item.title: Tools-gffread(cufflinks)
item.description: gffread gffread这工具，官网的定义为used to generate a FASTA file with the DNA sequences for all transcripts in a GFF file,比如一个很常见的需求，对于stringtie组装后的gt

item.title: alignment
item.description: Hisat2 HISAT2是一个快速和敏感的比对程序，用于将下一代测序读数（全基因组、转录组和外显组测序数据）映射到人类基因组群体（以及单个参考基因组）

item.title: Getting Started With hugo-geo
item.description:
Setting up and configuring hugo-geo is as simple as changing a few values in your site config.toml. Lets look at this example site’s config and go over what each of hugo-geo’s site [params] do.

If this guide doesn’t answer your question it may be covered in the Hugo documentation.

item.title: About Me
item.description: This placeholder page could be your “about me” page, where you detail your contact information, portfolio pieces, and describe yourself and your goals.
